name: SENTINEL_JUDGE Calibration
description: All thresholds are SYMBOLIC - no magic numbers. Values must be injected at runtime or via calibration pack.

τ_CONFIDENCE_MIN.description: Minimum confidence score for evidence to be considered valid

τ_EVIDENCE_COMPLETENESS_MIN.description: Minimum ratio of required evidence that must be present

τ_MISSING_COUNT_GT.description: Maximum number of missing evidence items before DEFER

τ_CONFLICT_THRESHOLD.description: Threshold for conflict detection between evidence items

τ_J1_SCORE_MIN.description: Minimum J1 emotion binding score for PASS

resolution_mechanism.description: Thresholds must be provided via runtime configuration or calibration pack
resolution_mechanism.fallback: DEFER verdict if symbol is UNCALIBRATED

validation_rules: No numeric values allowed in this file
Implementation must DEFER if threshold is not calibrated
Calibration pack (future) will provide actual values
